mapper.select: select pm.importance, p.proj_name, m.name from ProjectMember pm LEFT JOIN Member m ON pm.m_num = m.m_num LEFT JOIN Project p ON pm.proj_id = p.proj_id order by importance asc

SELECT p.proj_id, CASE WHEN pm.importance = 100 THEN m.name ELSE "" END AS name FROM Project p LEFT JOIN ProjectMember pm ON p.proj_id = pm.proj_id AND pm.importance = 100 LEFT JOIN Member m ON pm.m_num = m.m_num
SELECT p.proj_id, p.start_date, p.proj_name, m.name, pm.importance FROM Project p JOIN ProjectMember pm ON p.proj_id = pm.proj_id JOIN Member m ON pm.m_num = m.m_num ORDER BY pm.importance ASC;
select m.name, pm.m_num, p.proj_name, pm.importance from ProjectMember pm LEFT JOIN Member m ON m.m_num = pm.m_num LEFT JOIN Project p ON p.proj_id = pm.proj_id where pm.proj_id = #{proj_id}
